column1: Uchi////After eating at Uchiko twice in Austin
column2: the Houston Uchi location left me disappointed. The quality of the food was just not there. Flavorless
column3: uninspired tiny portions of nothing. I've never seen smaller nigiri portions in my life. We gave up and left hungry after spending $120. That's just not acceptable. Won't be back to this location. Spend your money elsewhere.
